mapper.select:
/* 메뉴 관리 > 조회 */
SELECT LEVEL AS lvl , IN_SMI.* FROM ( SELECT menu_id , hr_menu_id , (SELECT smi2.menu_nm FROM practice.sys_menu_info smi2 WHERE smi2.menu_id = smi.hr_menu_id) AS hr_menu_nm , menu_nm , menu_ctnt , page_url , ord_by_cls , icon_val , use_yn , cret_dtm , upd_dtm , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM practice.sys_menu_info smi2 WHERE smi2.hr_menu_id = smi.menu_id) AS lr_menu_cnt FROM practice.sys_menu_info smi ) IN_SMI
AND (menu_nm LIKE '%'||#{menuNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' OR hr_menu_nm LIKE '%'||#{menuNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
AND use_yn = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (hr_menu_id IS NULL OR hr_menu_id = '')
AND (hr_menu_id IS NOT NULL OR hr_menu_id != '')
START WITH IN_SMI.hr_menu_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR IN_SMI.menu_id = IN_SMI.hr_menu_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY ord_by_cls
